definitions.definition: Physical area administered by a sheriff.
Former administrative area of Britain; a county.
definitions.example: Yorkshire is the largest shire in England.

definitions.definition: The general area in which a person lives or comes from, used in the context of travel within the United Kingdom.
definitions.example: When are you coming back to the shire?

definitions.definition: A rural or outer suburban local government area of Australia.
To (re)constitute as one or more shires or counties.
